body.p: This resets the number of nodes that Couchbase Server has automatically failed-over. You can send a request to set the auto-failover number to 0. This is a global setting for all clusters. You need to be authenticated to change this value. No parameters are required:
Replace the admin, password, and localhost values in the above example with your actual values.

codeblock.codeph: POST /settings/autoFailover/resetCount HTTP/1.1 Host: localhost:8091 Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded Authorization: Basic YWRtaW46YWRtaW4=
This endpoint isn't available yet. 401 Unauthorized
